BackstoryDef.title: obsidia enforcer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Conditioned for loyalty, [PAWN_nameDef] served as a planetary suppressor and off-world asset in Ascendancy-controlled zones. Their directives prioritized force application, area control, and civilian deterrence. \nSocial nuance was deemed a non-essential trait.

BackstoryDef.title: obsidia marksman
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Selected for accuracy and discipline, [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to long-range infantry units within the Ascendancy’s perimeter control forces. \n[PAWN_pronoun] moved quietly, shot cleanly, and expected nothing in return. Outside the scope of duty, [PAWN_pronoun] struggled to define purpose.

BackstoryDef.title: obsidia observer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to long-duration embedment in unstable frontier outposts and external research zones. [PAWN_possessive] mission was observation, threat analysis, and "incident response"—a euphemism for assassinations carried out under civilian cover. \n[PAWN_possessive] presence was rarely noticed—until it was too late.
